com.linagora.ldap

Class LdapFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linagora.ldap.LdapFormatter

  • public class LdapFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used by LdapWriter component to actually create connection and managed update on the LDAP directory and transform CloverETL internal data representation to LDAP objects.
    Since:
    september 2006
    See Also:
    LdapWriter

      Replace attribute of an existing entry.

    • Field Detail

      • ADD_ENTRY

        public static final int ADD_ENTRY
        Add a new entry. Metadata MUST contains 'dn', 'objectclass' and linked mandatory attributes of the LDAP schema for the corresponding dn.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REMOVE_ENTRY

        public static final int REMOVE_ENTRY
        Remove an entry. Only 'dn' field is mandatory in metadata, other metadata field are ignored.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REPLACE_ATTRIBUTES

        public static final int REPLACE_ATTRIBUTES
        Replace attribute of an existing entry. 'dn' metadata is mandatory and MUST exists on LDAP directory.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REMOVE_ATTRIBUTES

        public static final int REMOVE_ATTRIBUTES
        Remove attributes on an entry. 'dn' is mandatory.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open(java.lang.Object object,
        DataRecordMetadata metadata)
          throws BadDataFormatException,
                 javax.naming.NamingException
        This is an init methode : the connection to the LDAP server is set, the transformation object from Jetel Data to Ldap Modification Object is initialised.
        Parameters:
        object - not used !
        metadata - describing input data to transform to LDAP object
        Throws:
        javax.naming.NamingException
        BadDataFormatException

      • write

        public void write(DataRecord record)
           throws javax.naming.NamingException,
                  BadDataFormatException
        Update or create an LDAP entry from a Jetel record The "dn" Field MUST exist in the metada and MUST NOT be null.
        Parameters:
        record -
        Throws:
        javax.naming.NamingException
        JetelException
        JetelException
        BadDataFormatException
